languages.text: "Хотела бы я быть хоть вполовину такой уверенной и смелой, как вы, Лорд-капитан". {n}Слабая улыбка касается бледных губ Кассии, и девушка качает головой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Хотела бы я быть хоть вполовину такой уверенной и смелой, как вы, Лорд-капитан". {n}Слабая улыбка касается бледных губ Кассии, и девушка качает головой.{/n}

languages.text: "I wish I were half as confident and courageous as you, Lord Captain." {n}A weak smile crosses Cassia's pale lips and she shakes her head.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Хотела бы я быть хоть вполовину такой уверенной и смелой, как вы, Лорд-капитан". {n}Слабая улыбка касается бледных губ Кассии, и девушка качает головой.{/n}

"I wish I were half as confident and courageous as you, Lord Captain." {n}A flimsy smile crosses Cassia's pale lips and she shakes her head.{/n}

"I wish I were half as confident and courageous as you, Lord Captain." {n}A weak smile crosses Cassia's pale lips and she shakes her head.{/n}
"I wish I were half as confident and courageous as you, Lord Captain." {n}A weak smile crosses Cassia's pale lips and she shakes her head.{/n}

languages.text: 「あなたの半分でいいから自信と勇気があれば良かったのですが…ロード・キャプテン」{n}カシアの青白い唇に弱々しい笑みがこぼれ、彼女は首を横に振った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I wish I were half as confident and courageous as you, Lord Captain." {n}A weak smile crosses Cassia's pale lips and she shakes her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの半分でいいから自信と勇気があれば良かったのですが…ロード・キャプテン」{n}カシアの青白い唇に弱々しい笑みがこぼれ、彼女は首を横に振った。{/n}

languages.text: “要是我能有你一半的信心与勇气就好了，舰长大人。”{n}卡西娅苍白的嘴唇上掠过一丝虚弱的微笑，摇了摇头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I wish I were half as confident and courageous as you, Lord Captain." {n}A weak smile crosses Cassia's pale lips and she shakes her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “要是我能有你一半的信心与勇气就好了，舰长大人。”{n}卡西娅苍白的嘴唇上掠过一丝淡淡的微笑，摇了摇头。{/n}

languages.text: «Ojalá tuviera la mitad de valentía y seguridad en mí misma que usted, Lord Capitán». {n}Una débil sonrisa curva los pálidos labios de Cassia mientras niega con la cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I wish I were half as confident and courageous as you, Lord Captain." {n}A weak smile crosses Cassia's pale lips and she shakes her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ojalá tuviera la mitad de valentía y seguridad en mí misma que usted, Lord Capitán». {n}Una débil sonrisa curva los pálidos labios de Cassia mientras niega con la cabeza.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich wünschte, ich wäre nur halb so zuversichtlich und mutig wie Ihr, Lord Captain." {n}Ein schwaches Lächeln huscht über Cassias blasse Lippen, als sie den Kopf schüttelt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I wish I were half as confident and courageous as you, Lord Captain." {n}A weak smile crosses Cassia's pale lips and she shakes her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich wünschte, ich wäre nur halb so zuversichtlich und mutig wie Ihr, Lord Captain." {n}Ein dünnes Lächeln huscht über Cassias blasse Lippen und sie schüttelt den Kopf.{/n}

languages.text: « J'aimerais avoir ne serait-ce que la moitié de votre courage, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Cassia secoue la tête, un sourire ténu aux lèvres.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I wish I were half as confident and courageous as you, Lord Captain." {n}A weak smile crosses Cassia's pale lips and she shakes her head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'aimerais avoir ne serait-ce que la moitié de votre courage, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Cassia secoue la tête, un léger sourire aux lèvres.{/n}

languages.text: "Keşke ben de senin kadar kendimden emin ve cesur olabilseydim Lord Kaptan." {n}Başını iki yana sallayan Cassia'nın solgun dudaklarında zayıf bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I wish I were half as confident and courageous as you, Lord Captain." {n}A weak smile crosses Cassia's pale lips and she shakes her head.{/n}
